headline.main: BRITISH IN AFRIGA MEET HUGE TASKS; Gamut of Weather and Range of Wild Terrain Put Heavy Burden on Troops ITALIANS LESS FORTUNATE Loss of Their Communications and Absence of Supplies Held to Doom Efforts

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Feb. 2 -- To appreciate the vastness of the area in which General Sir Archibald P. Wavell's cosmopolitan armies are operating on what may be termed the Northeast African battlegrounds, it is necessary to understand that it is about as large as the Continent of Europe.
abstract: difficulties facing Gen A P Wavell in Africa discussed
